attributes.action: use all his powers to PROMOTE EFFECTIVE FINANCIAL REGULATION
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Accountants and Auditors cannot be effectively regulated by the ICAEW.
The ICAEW are funded by the Profession.

Similarly the FSA is funded by the firms it regulates.

It is naive to expect effective regulation of ones payoligarchs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
